overview_description: Stream Deck is a customizable control panel with LCD keys that can trigger unlimited actions with one-touch tactile operation. It allows users to control apps, launch social posts, adjust audio, mute microphones, turn on lights, and much more, with visual feedback confirming every command. The Elgato Stream Deck is a customizable control platform featuring programmable LCD keys that streamline workflows for content creators, broadcasters, and professionals. The device integrates with streaming software, productivity applications, and smart home systems to provide one-touch control over complex tasks.
main_functions: Live streaming control and scene switching
supported_file_formats: Image formats: PNG, JPEG, GIF, SVG for custom icons
Audio formats: MP3, WAV for sound effects
Video formats: MP4, MOV for animated icons
Import/export formats for backup and sharing
system_requirements: Internet: Required for software updates and plugin downloads
Compatible with: OBS Studio, XSplit, Streamlabs, and 100+ applications
installation_setup: Download Stream Deck software from official website
Profile setup and customization through software
Download Stream Deck software from Elgato's website and connect the device via USB
The software automatically detects connected Stream Deck devices and provides setup wizards for initial configuration
Multiple devices can be managed from a single software instance
key_features: Customizable LCD keys with visual feedback
Profile switching based on active applications
Marketplace integration for plugins and icons
Regular software updates with new features
plugin_extension_support: The Stream Deck Marketplace offers hundreds of plugins for popular applications including OBS, Philips Hue, Spotify, Twitter, Discord, and productivity tools
Third-party developers contribute plugins through the SDK, and users can create custom plugins using JavaScript or other supported languages
user_interface_overview: The Stream Deck software features an intuitive drag-and-drop interface with device preview, action library, and property inspector
Users can organize actions into folders, create multiple pages, and customize visual elements
The interface supports light and dark themes with accessibility options
community_tutorials: Stream Deck has an active community sharing profiles, icons, and tutorials through forums, Discord, and social media
Official resources include video tutorials, documentation, and community showcases
Third-party content creators provide extensive educational content and workflow examples
licensing: Proprietary hardware with free software - Proprietary software with free Stream Deck application
latest_version_release_date: Stream Deck MK.2 and various models available - Stream Deck 6.6+ (2024) with ongoing updates and feature additions
example_projects_outputs: Gaming streaming setups with scene management
